destiny-oauth

#### Reference
- http://blog.mgechev.com/2014/02/19/create-https-tls-ssl-application-with-express-nodejs/

```json
{
  "Response": {
    "accessToken": {
      "value": "",
      "readyin": 0,
      "expires": 3600
    },
    "refreshToken": {
      "value": "",
      "readyin": 1800,
      "expires": 7776000
    },
    "scope": 225
  },
  "ErrorCode": 1,
  "ThrottleSeconds": 0,
  "ErrorStatus": "Success",
  "Message": "Ok",
  "MessageData": {}
}
```
